item.description: Let's try this again!  Weather dependent- so will be cancelled due to rain or temperatures below 15 degrees...otherwise- we're on!!  This will be a brisk, quick after work walk...perfect to get a little exercise in. I'm told Route 1 provides a little bit of light on this trail, and it's otherwise flat and typically free of any obstacles. I will wear my headlamp, and feel free to bring yours if you have one and want it. It's about 2.5 miles round trip, and I do walk fairly quickly...so I'd like to be able to do the full trail at least once, and perhaps repeat a portion of it if time allows.  Since it will only get darker and colder if we wait, we'll kick off right at 5:15, so please be on time (or just hussle and catch up with us...it is an easy trail to find the group!).  NOTE THAT WE DON'T MEET AT STRIPERS...Friedenfels St (where the parking lot for the trail is) is directly across Rt 1 from Stripers. It's a little tricky to find at first, but basically the blinking yellow light at Stripers, across Rt 1. Please bring a dollar to contribute to meetup fees. Thanks!

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: After work walk at Salisbury Rail Trail
